answers.answer: Could be pcos, being heavy, diabetes and irregular periods are all signs. I have it and its easily managed .... Get your dr to test you for it xxx

question: i dont know if anyone can help me. im a big lady and when i had my last period was on the 16 april of 2012 its now july and still no sign of them.i went to see my doc and im not pregnant.could my weight be stopping my periods.my  weight is 153kgs i also have diabeties.
title: what going on with my periods i need help please.
